message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $12000. I'm confident you'll love it!

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the enthusiasm, but I believe we can reach a more mutually beneficial agreement. Considering the value of the product to me is $12000, I would like to propose a price of $14000.

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective, but I'm still not willing to go that low. Considering the value of the product to me is $15000, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'll offer you the product for $16000. This is a fair compromise, and I believe it's a great opportunity for us to come to an agreement.
